posts.post_content:
I have a couple dozen lower-grade T205 and 206's listed below that I'd like to trade, preferably, or sell.  
   
I need quite a few from both sets and am always looking to upgrade, so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have.

If you want to buy, make me an offer or ask me for a price.  Paypal "payment owed" preferred, but check's okay as well.   

Post here or email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url].
Thanks.

Doug
 
*Note: The ungraded cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a line on the outer border--and a pocket-page:

T205's:

Bergen, nice front, back damage,
Murphy. 
SGC 30, James Scott,
SGC 10, Beals Becker,

T206's:

Donlin, with sausage bat,
Ferris,
Meyers, portrait [nice front; stamp on back]--SOLD--

Thanks Josh, Patrick, and Brian for the sales and trade.

T206 Scott and scans of graded cards added.

Doug

More to come this week.
